WorkItem.Description:
Hi !
 
The ApplicationCommands.Copy is well used, but not the paste, when will you implement the paste on the grid ?
 
Thanks
Jeremy.

Comments.Message:
Hi Jeremy,

We will not be implementing Paste in the DataGrid since in trying to design the feature, we found that any operation outside of the simple case of pasting a single cell could have multiple different behaviors and was very app-specific, so we decided to leave this up to app authors.  However, we included the OnPastingCellClipboardContent method as a convenience for developers who wished to implement Paste.  You can find instructions for implementing Paste functionality here: http://blogs.msdn.com/vinsibal/archive/2008/09/19/wpf-datagrid-clipboard-paste-sample.aspx.

Thanks!
Samantha
